name: BitterSweet (NightEmber)
description:
Made For Ludum Dare 45 - https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/bittersweet

A young boy wanders into the night for his first Halloween, will he survive the witches, goblins, ghouls and ghosts!

Run from house to house, door-to-door getting as much candy as you can! Just as there are treats there are surely tricks! Try and see how much candy you can get!
